review: At this time, I can't recommend Chromecast to other buyers.Chromecast is not ready for prime time. It works well for what it does, but doesn't do much.  You have to subscribe to premium services or buy content to use it.  Your only free choices are casting YouTube or a Chrome tab.  But Chrome tab content casting only works on laptops and desktops.  It does not integrate with Chrome for Android!!!  If you want to buy it to use with your Android smart phone --- DON'T because for the most part, you won't!  You can't cast any of the pictures or videos you took unless you upload them to YouTube first.  Wait until there are many 3rd party apps available that actually work.  Or maybe wait until Chrome for Android is able to cast.  That will give you some minimal functionality that's reasonably convenient.  Otherwise, you will have to set your laptop up in your TV room.Some have dubbed Chromecast the "Chromecasket."  That's a good name.
author: Stan "Tells it like it is."
